name: Behold the Face of Justice!
story_text: You attack a foe and your enemies behold a vision of the true nature of your resolve.

low.conditions: Frightened; if the target has each enemy within 2 squares of them is of you (save ends)

mid.conditions: Frightened; if the target has each enemy within 2 squares of them is of you (save ends)

high.conditions: Frightened; if the target has each enemy within 2 squares of them is of you (save ends)

effect: Each enemy frightened this way is pushed up to 2 squares away from the target and takes psychic damage equal to your Presence score.
